alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 19 at 3:01PM MDT until March 20 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Periods of heavy snow are expected Sunday afternoon. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts on mountain passes and summits. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 6 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick road conditions on mountain passes and areas of slushy conditions. Heavy snow can quickly reduce visibilities.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
